data.message: I'm trying to enter now with the 4 bottles I have here but the site is just going back to the how to enter page not giving me the box for the codes! 😡

replies.message: Hi Holly, we're sorry to hear this. The website seems to be up and running. You still have the chance to win a holiday to your dream destination as a bonus draw will take place on 30/09/17. We'd recommend clearing the cookies on your browser before trying to enter again. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) to hep you troubleshoot. Thanks
Hey Holly, we didn't hear from you. Please could you send us a private message with your email and the codes you were trying to enter, so that we look into this for you? Thanks
